decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent. Reason: As required by Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 and development management policies DM10 and DM12 of the Core Strategy 2012 and policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021).

Within twelve months of the date of this permission, replacement of all of the temporary roof tiles shall have been implemented to the final roof tiles in strict accordance with the approved details and retained thereafter.Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 and development management policies DM10 and DM12 of the Core Strategy 2012 and policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
